short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple chrome extension to track where you are in your audiobooks on various free sites

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension tracks your position in books on supported sites such as audiobooklabs.com. 
It provides a simple interface to navigate to and play/pause your tracked audio books. Furthermore, it allows users to create an account that will allow them to store their audio books in the cloud and sync across devices. Users without an account have access to all of the same features but without cloud storage and syncing.
